DOC.brief_summary: Fluid management study in patients with type 2 diabetes and autonomic neuropathy.
DOC.brief_title: Fluid Retention in Rosiglitazone Treated Subjects With Autonomic Neuropathy.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Subjects with Type 2 Diabetes (T2DM) as defined by the 1999 WHO criteria [World Health Organisation , 1988/NCD/NCS/99.2] with stable FPG of = 7.0 and = 15.0 mmol/l who have been established on insulin therapy for at least 6 months BMI = 40 kg.m2 Subject who is willing and able to provide a signed and dated written informed consent. Subjects with an HbA1c level > 12% Subjects taking oral hypoglycaemic agents other than metformin Subjects on insulin dosage > 200 units/day
